data.name: XListEntryListener
desc: specifies a listener for changes in a string entry list

methods.name: allEntriesChanged
desc: notifies the listener that all entries of the list have changed.
The listener should retrieve the complete new list by calling the XListEntrySource.getAllListEntries() method of the event source (which is denoted by com.sun.star.lang.EventObject.Source).

methods.name: entryChanged
desc: notifies the listener that a single entry in the list has change

methods.name: entryRangeInserted
desc: notifies the listener that a range of entries has been inserted into the list

methods.name: entryRangeRemoved
desc: notifies the listener that a range of entries has been removed from the list
